name: mindquantum-website
description: Static website for MindQuantum with Eleventy and Sphinx-built docs.

scripts.dev:with-docs: npm run build && DOCS_LANG=zh_cn bash scripts/build_docs.sh && DOCS_LANG=en bash scripts/build_docs.sh && eleventy --serve
scripts.build:all: npm run build && DOCS_LANG=zh_cn bash scripts/build_docs.sh && DOCS_LANG=en bash scripts/build_docs.sh
